    • Method Detail

      • appendToFile

        public void appendToFile(java.lang.String strFileName,
                         java.lang.String strContent)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        The purpose of this method is to accept a filename and append the contents to the file. The saveToFile method in thisvclass erases the file before creating a new one so this one features the append parameter as explained in chapter four around page 240.
        Parameters:
        strFileName - The name of the file to append to.
        strContent - The content to append.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - In case there are any file errors.

      • fileExists

        public boolean fileExists(java.lang.String strFileName)
        The purpose of this method is to accept a full file path and name and determine if it exists on disk.
        Specified by:
        fileExists in interface InetTemplate
        Parameters:
        strFileName - The file to check
        Returns:
        boolExists

      • getFromFile

        public java.lang.String getFromFile(java.lang.String strFileName)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The purpose of this method is to accept a full file path and name as a parameter and check to see if it exists using the fileExists method. Then return the file as a string.
        Specified by:
        getFromFile in interface InetTemplate
        Parameters:
        strFileName - The file to check.
        Returns:
        strFileContents The contents of the file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - May throw IOException if there is a file access issue.

      • getPREData

        public java.lang.String getPREData(java.lang.String strPage)
        The purpose of this method is to accept an HTML web page as a string and extract the data that is between the PRE tags using the getRegEx function.
        Specified by:
        getPREData in interface InetTemplate
        Parameters:
        strPage - The raw page output
        Returns:
        all data between PRE tags

        public java.lang.String getRegEx(java.lang.String strInput,
                                 java.lang.String strPattern)
        The purpose of this method is to extract a small string from a larger one using a Regular Expression and the pattern specified as a parameter.
        Specified by:
        getRegEx in interface InetTemplate
        Parameters:
        strInput - The string to be searched
        strPattern - The pattern to match
        Returns:
        The matching string

      • getURLRaw

        public java.lang.String getURLRaw(java.lang.String strURL)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        The purpose of this method is to accept a string URL, create a string using the StringBuilder class and return it as one long string.
        Specified by:
        getURLRaw in interface InetTemplate
        Parameters:
        strURL - The URL to read.
        Returns:
        The raw data read from the URL
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - May throw IOException or MalformedURLException.

                throws java.lang.Exception
        The purpose of this method is to accept a string and save it to a local file.
        Specified by:
